thread.section_title: Devonvale Golf & Wine Estate - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Stellenbosch, South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Absolute Gem
thread.title_full: Absolute Gem - Review of Devonvale Golf & Wine Estate, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: DougCapeTown
title: Absolute Gem
text: Played golf here with some old friends last month and enjoyed the course, really well designed and pretty open. The greens and fairways are superbly maintained and green even during this terrible drought. It is very busy but it was during the festive season. The staff at the clubhouse & pro-shop are friendly and helpful, half way house was quick & efficient with our meals, all in all a very pleasant days golf.
